title: FASL-Seg: Anatomy and Tool Segmentation of Surgical Scenes
summary: This paper proposes FASL-Seg, a model for anatomy and tool segmentation in surgical scenes, addressing the challenge of balancing high-level contextual features and low-level edge features.
usefulness_reason: Score 60 assigned because the paper explicitly mentions 'capturing high-level contextual features', which is relevant to the 'Contextual dataset' aspect of the query.
